name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Webvizio: Website Feedback and Bug Tracking Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduce time spent on content revisions and QA testing for live websites and web apps with a visual collaboration tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify and accelerate your web development projects with Webvizio, a Chrome extension that enables teams to leave visual feedback, manage tasks, and communicate seamlessly—all directly on live web pages. Webvizio brings everything you need for smooth, efficient collaboration right into your browser.

Key Features:

- Visual Annotations
Leave comments and visual notes directly on live websites, pointing to specific elements to make feedback clearer.

- Task Management
Manage all tasks inside the Webvizio app, keeping your projects organized and team members aligned in one place.

- Easy Copy and Share
Copy enriched task descriptions and links to share with teammates for quick access and follow-up.

- Share Tasks with Complete Context
Automatically bundle task details, page URL, technical specs, screenshots, and device data when sharing tasks—ensuring all team members have full context.

Who It's For:

- Web Developers and Designers: 
Streamline revisions with precise, visual feedback on design and functionality.

- Project Managers
Track project progress, manage tasks, and keep the team aligned on objectives.

- QA Teams
Create a task in one click and instantly receive a complete task summary with a screenshot and all necessary technical information, ready to be inserted into any task management tool you work with.

- Digital Agencies and Freelancers
Enhance client collaboration by capturing detailed feedback, reducing back-and-forth communication and revision cycles.

Benefits:
- Reduce Revision Times: Replace lengthy emails and scattered notes with clear, visual annotations directly on web pages.
- Centralize Communication: Keep discussions and feedback on the exact page where tasks are created, so nothing gets lost.
- Boost Productivity: Streamline feedback loops, task assignments, and project tracking to help teams stay efficient and focused.

Get Started Instantly
1 Pin Webvizio: Add the Webvizio icon to your toolbar for quick access.
2 Connect Your Profile: Log in and start managing tasks and providing feedback right away.

Experience the ease of efficient, context-rich collaboration on web projects. Install Webvizio today and elevate your team’s workflow!
